synopsis.text: Asagi Sakura illustrates the story of Masahiro, the grandson of the legendary exorcist, Abe no Seimei, who once imparted his wisdom to the young boy. Despite his lineage, Masahiro struggles to fulfill his destiny as an onmyouji due to the loss of his supernatural sight, a crucial ability for exorcists. With no other options, Masahiro attempts to forge a different path in life. However, everything changes when he encounters a mysterious mononoke, whom he names Mokkun. After witnessing Masahiro's hidden potential during a battle with a demon, Mokkun becomes an invaluable ally in his quest to become the greatest onmyouji. Together, they embark on a journey to uncover Masahiro's true power and unveil the enigma that is Mokkun.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
